title: K2 Skate F.I.T. 80 Pro
features: Speed Lacing - Secures skates with one pull making it easy to put on and take off
Stability Plus Cuff - Provides the right amount of support, flexibility, reliability and comfort to have a good time
F.B.I. frame - is a vibration-absorbing composite frame that is interlocked with the base, keeping the rider more balanced by being lower to the ground
ABEC 5 Bearings - dependable spin perfect for beginners
description: Product InfoStay fit, active and ready to roll. The K2 F.I.T. 80 Pro Inline Skate is ideal for the beginner who is looking to enter into the fitness skating world. SoftBoot Construction offers lots of comfort and ventilation, while the Stability Plus Cuff blends support and versatility while eliminating skate weight. The FBI Frame absorbs vibrations for a smoother ride, while the Speed Lacing System has you secure in your skate with just one pull. Product Details&sbsp;Lacing SystemSpeed Lace secure your skates with just one pull.Frame MaterialFBI Frame Frame Base Interlocking creates a composite frame that absorbs more road vibrations. This frame is ideal for beginners or those who cruise on rough terrain.Wheel Size80mmDurometer80Bearing GradePerformanceFeaturesStability Plus Cuff blends support and versatility while eliminating overall skate weight.SoftBoot Construction offers a sneaker-like feel for increased comfort, ventilation and breathability.Entry-level fitness skate; Product Specification&sbsp; Ability Level: Beginner-Intermediate; Intended Use: Fitness; Lacing System: Speed Lace; Size Adjustable: No; ;
